ItemDescription.SourceString: Target up to 8 enemies while Aiming Down Sights to mark them with a Glyph. Releasing Aim Down Sights fires a salvo of projectiles that target each enemy marked with a Glyph.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Target up to 8 enemies while Aiming Down Sights to mark them with a Glyph. Releasing Aim Down Sights fires a salvo of projectiles that target each enemy marked with a Glyph.
